title: "Trying to reconnect" after login screen appears
body: So when the login screen appears, all I get is the "trying to reconnect" thing and all I can do is exit the client. How do I fix this ?

replies.body: Your network seems to be blocked from reaching the login servers, so it can't authenticate and get in.  Go through the instructions in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to configure your network to get through.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Hey man I went through connection issues and the problem of only having the "trying to connect" and the option to only exit the launcher still persist, is there any other solutions?

Thanks for going through the guide, though it sucks that it wasn't able to solve your specific issue.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help individually.  Also, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attack some logs to offer more context.  We'll get back to you!
